original_title: Las dos caras de la moneda
overview: The two faces of the coin, ambiented in Madrid, is the story of Lucas an arabian drugdealer, and Francesco a italian poker player, who have completly opposite points of view about life, opposite objectives, opposite mentality and opposite ways, but the  two will meet in the streets of Madrid between prostitutes, drugs, gambling and hoolligans.  ---MADE WITH LESS THAN 1000€---
tagline: The two faces of the coin, español
title: Las dos caras de la moneda
